Views:

class Website.views.BaseView[исходный код]

Base view class; every page view class is a child of BaseView; has get and post functions, that are called when get or post methods are used; has a template_name in init that must be redefined in child class;

base_context(request)[исходный код]

Function to obtain the basic parameters of the context and render it

base_render(request)[исходный код]

Function to render page with context.

static get_base_menu(request) → list[исходный код]

Function to obtain the basic parameters of the context.

class Website.views.IndexView[исходный код]

View of main website page

class Website.views.LoginView[исходный код]

View Based Class to display login page.

get(request)[исходный код]

Redefining «get» function to create login form.

post(request)[исходный код]

Redefining «post» function to login user.

class Website.views.LogoutView[исходный код]

View Based Class for logout.

get(request)[исходный код]

To logout user.

class Website.views.ProfileView[исходный код]

View of the profile page. Supports both teacher and student account type.

class Website.views.ScheduleView[исходный код]

A view for schedule page.

class Website.views.SignupView[исходный код]

View Based Class to display registration page.

get(request)[исходный код]

Redefining «get» function to create signup form.

Redefining «post» function to initialize user registration.
